item.description:
Hello all,

Come on over for a cookout and games on Sunday afternoon June 12th starting around 3:00pm. I have tons of left over alcohol in my frig so you can take a chance and maybe I'll have what you like or you can BYOB, I'll provide the meat, soda, rolls, condiments and salad dressings but it would be nice to do a bit of a potluck so everyone please let me know what you are willing to bring for an appetizer, salad or a dessert. We'll have a fire in the fire pit to chill out later on in the evening. :)  

To those with allergies I have a dog named Princess that is shedding overtime these days.

PARKING: Please park on the road in the emergency lane, CVS or funeral home parking lots. The spots in the front are reserved for people and my neighbor does not like people parking on the side of the house. I really really appreciate your cooperation regarding this.

Please remember to bring $1.00 for our awesome organizer, Nina.

I look forward to hosting you all.

Take care,

Margaret

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Games and a Cook out at Margariiitttaaaassss
